docs: the complimentary breakfast was packed on sunday .we had an enjoyable stay at the hyatt place chicago in august .the hotel staff are friendly and helpful with information and services .great hotel ! was greeted by a fellow brit who was working on the front desk , which was a funny surprise .thank goodness ! in terms of the staff , they were great . </DOC> the hotel was clean , efficient , had a bonus free breakfast , and a large comfortable room .the free breakfast was great , good selection and well stocked .friendly staff and well equipped fitness center .the staff are relaxed and friendly , and made for a quick check in .however , they were quick to clean when they did . </DOC> my reservation was made at the last minute , in the middle of the night , and the staff could not have been more helpful .great greeting , butbut it seemed to be very chaotic at the front desk .we have only been here a few hours and we have heard the fire trucks numerous times .the hotel staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay and made us feel so welcome . </DOC> the staff is extremely personable and helpful and they have a text concierge service , which i thought was very convenient for making restaurant reservations or getting trip recommendations .the front desk staff was very attentive and friendly .staff is very pleasant and responsive .thank you , mackenzie , for your great customer service .all in good working order . </DOC> it 's a very nice hotel - friendly staff , spacious rooms , a good complimentary breakfast , and decent wi - fi .friendly , smiling and helpful staff .the breakfast had quite a large variety and was very filling .the staff are extremely friendly and helpful !first the good news . </DOC> front desk staff is super friendly .i saw a staff member walking in then saw the hallway of the other hotel as i peeked through .hyatt place , knowing this provides ear plugs at the bed which was helpful and very proactive on their part to making their guests stay more comfortable .the service was great , friendly front of the house staff and welcoming .the eggs and sausage were cold . </DOC> from check in to check out , they were courteous , welcoming , and professional , all of which keeps me loyal to the hyatt place brand .the buffet was outstanding for a hotel buffet ( not gourmet ; but good stuff ) , and gave us a great start each morning .-self - service laundry available ( $ 2 a washer/ $ 2 a dryer )-friendly , helpful , accommodating staff .this was the one real downfall that could be controlled . </DOC> i stayed at the hyatt place river north for work purposes recently and was really happy with my stay at the hotel and would highly recommend this property .i asked for an inside room with an " alley " view , which the desk clerk was surprised about , but knowing that those rooms are quietest , it was exactly what i was looking for .breakfasts were the normal hyatt place options , egg - sandwiches , french toast , and various fruit salads , yogurts and cereals - all tasty and fresh and a good quick way to start the day .however , either the hotel put them all together on one floor , or they were really well behaved as i never heard a peep !the hotel staff was great
